welcome_message_body: Welcome to Simi Valley, where small-town charm meets big city attractions! Explore our beautiful parks, historical sites, and vibrant community. We hope you enjoy your time in our lovely city.

restaurants.name: Rustico
restaurants.description: Rustico is a italian restaurant located in Westlake Village.
restaurants.address: 1125 Lindero Canyon Rd (Kanan), Westlake Village, CA 91362

restaurants.name: Breakfast Cafe
restaurants.description: Breakfast Cafe is a breakfast spot located in Oak Park.
restaurants.address: 686 Lindero Canyon Rd (at Kanan Rd.), Oak Park, CA 91377

restaurants.name: Italia Deli & Bakery
restaurants.description: Italia Deli & Bakery is a deli located in Agoura Hills.
restaurants.address: 5657 Kanan Rd (at Thousand Oaks Blvd), Agoura Hills, CA 91301

restaurants.name: Agoura's Famous Deli
restaurants.description: Agoura's Famous Deli is a deli located in Agoura Hills.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, security, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering VIP services and amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oxnard Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

airports.airport_name: Point Mugu NAS (Naval Base Ventura County
